p: This is in line with data showing that the enteroviral signaling cascade, which leads to the IFN response, is increased before auto-antibody conversion and T1D (see above) [ 97], which again suggests virus infection and the boosted IFN response as primary event toward autoimmunity. It is very likely that the longer duration of enterovirus abidance in the host is defined by the genes and their unfavorable seasonal changes.
